title: Halloween skin; Scream/Ghostface Rengar
body:
Does the Haka-Rena (made by the brits) in place of the Haka which Rengar does normally. The traditional ghost face knife main weapon, with possible one of those demon looking trident Halloween costume things for the wrist or something more suiting. On/Off hood feature. The E-Bola could be bags of candy, Candycorn necklace instead of pumpkins and E-bola be pumpkins tied together with green tops; is limitless

Fkn perf right yea do it {{champion:107}}  Here is a rough idea http://oi61.tinypic.com/ftkocg.jpg

replies.body: Imagine special sound effect when he jumps on you with ghost particles and you literally just pop that would be scary as hell{{champion:107}} {{champion:107}} {{champion:107}} {{champion:107}} {{champion:107}} {{champion:107}} {{champion:107}} {{champion:107}}

1, Copyright issues. 2, Why Rengar, and not some other more suitable champion that isn't a giant cat? Like Akali, Kat, Shaco or Talon? Shaco especially would be perfect. Little pumpkin boxes, already has a slasher horror mask, and gives jump scares when he pops out of invis.
Talon would be cool, Shaco already has many good skins. Feroq ult Rengar jump scare better thou
I feel like Nocturne would b e a better ghost face and he already has a spooky skin
